Verses: 1 karththarai Nokkich Saththamittuk Kooppidugiren; Karththarai Nokkich Saththamittuk Kenjugiren.
2 avarukku Munbaaga En Sanjalaththai Ootrugiren; Avarukku Munbaaga En Nerukkaththai Arikkaiyidugiren.
3 en Aavi Ennil Thiyangumpodhu, Neer En Paadhaiyai Arindhirukkireer; Naan Nadakkira Vazhiyil Maraivaaga Enakkuk Kanni Vaiththaargal.
4 valadhupuramaaik Kannokkippaarum, Ennai Arivaar Oruvarum Illai; Enakku Adaikkalam Illaamarpoyitru; En Aaththumaavai Visaarippaar Oruvarum Illai.
5 karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidukiren; Neere En Adaikkalamum, Jeevanullor Dhesaththile En Pangumaayirukkireer Endren.
6 en Kookkuralukkuch Sevikodum, Naan Migavum Thaazhththappatten; Ennaip Pinthodarugiravargalukku Ennaith Thappuviyum, Avargal Ennilum Balavaangalaayirukkiraargal.
7 umadhu Naamaththai Naan Thudhikkumpadi, En Aaththumaavaik Kaavalukku Neengalaakkividum; Enakku Neer Dhayavuseyyumpodhu Needhimaangal Ennaich Soozhndhukolluvaargal.
